name: Deadly Stages
description:
Deadly Stages is a 2D survival shooter, so all depends on you on how long you last.

Maps:

  • Dev Test which is a an open field of death
  • Hell Map which includes demons and other hell like creatures

Mobs:

  • 1 mob type on each map

Drops:

  • Health
  • Shotgun (or ammo for it)
  • SMG (or ammo for it)

Weapons:

  • Pistol which is your starter weapon - has infinte ammo
  • Shotgun - has a spread shot
  • SMG - high fire rate

Features to come:

  • 2 more maps: cyber map (robots), aliens
  • 4 mob types on each map: normal, tank, high speed, higher damage
  • Mob visual upgrade
  • Character visual upgrade
  • Couch co-op

Bug known so far:

  • Enemies can break collision at corners of walls
  • Some reported infinite ammo
  • Sometimes shooting sfx doesn't play
  • No pause button
